body:
On Mon, Sep 20, 2010 at 2:30 PM, Kerl, Marion (SCR US EXT)
<marion.kerl.ext at siemens.com> wrote:
> Could you recommend any tutorials and manuals to start with Radiance?


Here are some links to introductory documents:


http://luminance.londonmet.ac.uk/learnix/docs.shtml


Look for the "Radiance Tutorial" PDF in the middle of the list.
Although these documents are centered towards Radiance on Unix/Linux
they also focus on the basics principles which you should be able to
translate to another platform.


Regards,
Thomas
